comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEST7B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEST7B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type ST7B model. This model is representative of static potential-source excitation systems. In this system, the AVR consists of a PI voltage regulator. A phase lead-lag filter in series allows introduction of a derivative function, typically used with brushless excitation systems. In that case, the regulator is of the PID type. In addition, the terminal voltage channel includes a phase lead-lag filter.  The AVR includes the appropriate

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kh
contents.comment: High-value gate feedback gain (K).  Typical Value 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kia
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kl
contents.comment: Low-value gate feedback gain (K).  Typical Value 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpa
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 40. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: oelin
contents.comment: OEL input selector (OELin). Typical Value = noOELinput. Default: None

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Regulator lag time constant (T).  Typical Value 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Regulator lead time constant (T).  Typical Value 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tg
contents.comment: Feedback time constant of inner loop field voltage regulator (T). Typical Value 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tia
contents.comment: Feedback time constant (T).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: uelin
contents.comment: UEL input selector (UELin). Typical Value = noUELinput. Default: None

contents.name: vmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage reference signal (V).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage reference signal (V).  Typical Value = 0.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -4.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
